summary: Tested chat match card design fixes - Backend APIs working perfectly, homepage MatchCards functional, but authentication issues prevent complete SharedMatchCard testing in messages page

integration_issues.issue: Unable to login with provided credentials (testmobile@test.com / Test1234! and admin@guessit.com / Admin123!)
Cannot access /messages page due to authentication failure - redirected to login

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% pass rate)
User registration and prediction APIs working
Homepage loads correctly with full MatchCards
Homepage shows 63 match cards with proper styling
Full MatchCards have vote buttons (1, X, 2)
Full MatchCards have GUESS IT, Advance, Remove buttons
Mobile and desktop responsive layout on homepage
SharedMatchCard component exists in MessagesPage.jsx with compact design
SharedMatchCard has reduced padding (px-2.5 py-2) vs full MatchCard
SharedMatchCard uses smaller fonts (9-11px) and compact buttons
MessageBubble correctly uses SharedMatchCard for match_share messages
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication system - login form not working with provided test credentials (testmobile@test.com / Test1234! and admin@guessit.com / Admin123!). This blocks testing of SharedMatchCard functionality in the messages page. Verify user accounts exist and passwords are correct, or provide working test credentials.
